attributes.action: seek an EU wide ban of the highly destructive fishing practice of bottom trawling.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bottom trawling is the same as burning rainforest or dynamiting coral reefs in that the habitat is destroyed. The UN Secretary General reported that 95 percent of damage to seamount ecosystems worldwide is caused by bottom trawling. It must be stopped.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
